TABLE.NAME: assign
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about an instance of mod_assign in a course.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the instance of the assignment. Displayed at the top of each page.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of the assignment. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field of the assignment. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: alwaysshowdescription
FIELD.COMMENT: If false the assignment intro will only be displayed after the allowsubmissionsfrom date. If true it will always be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: nosubmissions
FIELD.COMMENT: This field is a cache for is_any_submission_plugin_enabled() which allows Moodle pages to distinguish offline assignment types without loading the assignment class.

FIELD.NAME: submissiondrafts
FIELD.COMMENT: If true, assignment submissions will be considered drafts until the student clicks on the submit assignmnet button.

FIELD.NAME: sendnotifications
FIELD.COMMENT: Allows the disabling of email notifications in the assign module.

FIELD.NAME: sendlatenotifications
FIELD.COMMENT: Allows separate enabling of notifications for late assignment submissions.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: The due date for the assignment. Displayed to students.

FIELD.NAME: allowsubmissionsfromdate
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, submissions will only be accepted after this date.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade for this assignment. Can be negative to indicate the use of a scale.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this assign module instance were last modified.

FIELD.NAME: requiresubmissionstatement
FIELD.COMMENT: Forces the student to accept a submission statement when submitting an assignment

FIELD.NAME: completionsubmit
FIELD.COMMENT: If this field is set to 1, then the activity will be automatically marked as 'complete' once the user submits their assignment.

FIELD.NAME: cutoffdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The final date after which submissions will no longer be accepted for this assignment without an extensions.

FIELD.NAME: gradingduedate
FIELD.COMMENT: The expected date for marking the submissions.

FIELD.NAME: teamsubmission
FIELD.COMMENT: Do students submit in teams?

FIELD.NAME: requireallteammemberssubmit
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, a submission will not be accepted until all team members have submitted it.

FIELD.NAME: teamsubmissiongroupingid
FIELD.COMMENT: A grouping id to get groups for team submissions

FIELD.NAME: blindmarking
FIELD.COMMENT: Hide student/grader identities until the reveal identities action is performed

FIELD.NAME: revealidentities
FIELD.COMMENT: Show identities for a blind marking assignment

FIELD.NAME: attemptreopenmethod
FIELD.COMMENT: How to determine when students are allowed to open a new submission. Valid options are none, manual, untilpass

FIELD.NAME: maxattempts
FIELD.COMMENT: What is the maximum number of student attempts allowed for this assignment? -1 means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: markingworkflow
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, marking workflow features will be used in this assignment.

FIELD.NAME: markingallocation
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, marking allocation features will be used in this assignment

FIELD.NAME: sendstudentnotifications
FIELD.COMMENT: Default for send student notifications checkbox when grading.

FIELD.NAME: preventsubmissionnotingroup
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled a user will be unable to make a submission unless they are a member of a group.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this assignment instance.

INDEX.NAME: course
INDEX.COMMENT: The course this assignment instance belongs to.

INDEX.NAME: teamsubmissiongroupingid
INDEX.COMMENT: The grouping id for team submissions

TABLE.NAME: assign_submission
TABLE.COMMENT: This table keeps information about student interactions with the mod/assign. This is limited to metadata about a student submission but does not include the submission itself which is stored by plugins.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time of the first student submission to this assignment.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this assignment submission was modified by a student.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of this assignment submission. The current statuses are DRAFT and SUBMITTED.

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The group id for team submissions

FIELD.NAME: attemptnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to track attempts for an assignment

FIELD.NAME: latest
FIELD.COMMENT: Greatly simplifies queries wanting to know information about only the latest attempt.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this assignment submission.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The instance of mod_assign this submission belongs to.

INDEX.NAME: latestattempt
INDEX.COMMENT: Speed up queries for the latest attempt.

TABLE.NAME: assign_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: Grading information about a single assignment submission.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the assignment submission was first modified by a grader.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The most recent modification time for the assignment submission by a grader.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The numerical grade for this assignment submission. Can be determined by scales/advancedgradingforms etc but will always be converted back to a floating point number.

FIELD.NAME: attemptnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: The attempt number that this grade relates to

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this grade.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment instance this grade belongs to.

INDEX.NAME: userid
INDEX.COMMENT: The userid for the submission relating to this grade.

INDEX.NAME: uniqueattemptgrade
INDEX.COMMENT: This is a grade for a unique attempt.

TABLE.NAME: assign_plugin_config
TABLE.COMMENT: Config data for an instance of a plugin in an assignment.

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: The value of the config setting. Stored as text but can be interpreted by the plugin however it likes.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: Unique id to identify this plugin setting value.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment instance this config value relates to.

INDEX.NAME: subtype
INDEX.COMMENT: The subtype of this plugin (assign_submission or assign_feedback).

INDEX.NAME: name
INDEX.COMMENT: The name of this plugin setting.

TABLE.NAME: assign_user_mapping
TABLE.COMMENT: Map an assignment specific id number to a user

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: Unique ID for this user/assignment combination.

KEY.NAME: user
KEY.COMMENT: The user to map to an id

TABLE.NAME: assign_user_flags
TABLE.COMMENT: List of flags that can be set for a single user in a single assignment.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user these flags apply to.

FIELD.NAME: assignment
FIELD.COMMENT: The assignment these flags apply to.

FIELD.NAME: locked
FIELD.COMMENT: Student cannot make any changes to their submission if this flag is set.

FIELD.NAME: mailed
FIELD.COMMENT: Has the student been sent a notification about this grade update?

FIELD.NAME: extensionduedate
FIELD.COMMENT: An extension date assigned to an individual student.

FIELD.NAME: workflowstate
FIELD.COMMENT: The current workflow state of the grade

FIELD.NAME: allocatedmarker
FIELD.COMMENT: The allocated marker to this submission

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: The id field of the user table.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment id these flags apply to.

INDEX.NAME: mailed
INDEX.COMMENT: Has this user been mailed yet?

FIELD.NAME: assignid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references assign.id

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references groups.id. Can be null if this is a per-user override.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references user.id. Can be null if this is a per-group override.

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Rank for sorting overrides.

FIELD.NAME: allowsubmissionsfromdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Time at which students may start attempting this assign. Can be null, in which case the assign default is used.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: Time by which students must have completed their attempt. Can be null, in which case the assign default is used.

FIELD.NAME: cutoffdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Time by which students must have completed their attempt. Can be null, in which case the assign default is used.
